TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExtendedPropertyValueEditor extends System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor

Docs.summary: プロパティのすべての拡張エディター ロジックのコンテナーです。

remarks.format:
## 解説 The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor> class can hold two <xref:System.DataTemplate> objects, one for an inline editor and one for an extended editor. The inline editor provides a custom interface that appears within the bounds of the **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** window, and the extended editor provides an interface that appears in a new window.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the visual interface for the inline editor, and the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the extended editor. These are typically provided in a ResourceDictionary elsewhere in the project.
You should use the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> to invoke your custom <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor>.
## 例 <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!CODE [WFD\_ExtendedPropertyValueEditor\#0](WFD_ExtendedPropertyValueEditor#0)] -->

remarks.format: ## 解説 When used, its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.

Docs.summary: 拡張ポップアップまたは固定エディターに使用される を取得または設定します。

remarks.format: ## 解説 <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> が <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue> に設定されます。
